title: King Charles has started eating lunch for the first time. And it's half an avocado
content: King Charles now includes half an avocado in his lunch after being advised by doctors and Queen Camilla, especially since his cancer diagnosis. Previously, he used to skip lunch due to his busy schedule. He and Queen Camilla will soon embark on a royal tour of Australia suspending his cancer treatment for 11 days which has been permitted by his doctors.
summary: King Charles now includes half an avocado in his lunch after being advised by doctors and Queen Camilla, especially since his cancer diagnosis. Previously, he used to skip lunch due to his busy schedule. He and Queen Camilla will soon embark on a royal tour of Australia suspending his cancer treatment for 11 days which has been permitted by his doctors.

title: When Trump allowed Melania to watch top-secret Special Forces operation: 'Did she have security clearance?'
content: ​Melania got to know the identity of a soldier -- Colan, a black-faced Belgian Malinois US military dog who was injured in the US raid in Syria that killed ISIS leader Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi. The Daily Beast noted that Melania did not have a security clearance to enter the most secure room in the White House but cited Tim Naftali to state that a first lady may access government secrets at the discretion of the president.
summary: ​Melania got to know the identity of a soldier -- Colan, a black-faced Belgian Malinois US military dog who was injured in the US raid in Syria that killed ISIS leader Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi. The Daily Beast noted that Melania did not have a security clearance to enter the most secure room in the White House but cited Tim Naftali to state that a first lady may access government secrets at the discretion of the president.

title: Kamala Harris called 'disgusting' for 'Call Her Daddy' podcast; Alex Cooper says Trump is also welcome
content: Kamala Harris appeared on the 'Call Her Daddy' podcast amid criticism from Trump’s campaign, which accused her of self-interest during a crisis. Her discussion on abortion rights aimed to reach a broader, non-political audience. Host Alex Cooper expressed her intention to contribute to election discussions centered on women's issues, inviting Trump for similar dialogue.
summary: Kamala Harris appeared on the 'Call Her Daddy' podcast amid criticism from Trump’s campaign, which accused her of self-interest during a crisis. Her discussion on abortion rights aimed to reach a broader, non-political audience. Host Alex Cooper expressed her intention to contribute to election discussions centered on women's issues, inviting Trump for similar dialogue.

title: Explosion near Israeli embassy in Denmark
content: An explosion near the Israeli embassy in Denmark coincided with the anniversary of the Hamas attack on Israel. Copenhagen police are investigating a potential link to previous explosions, but believe the incident may have been caused by gunfire. Swedish nationals were previously detained in connection with earlier blasts.
summary: An explosion near the Israeli embassy in Denmark coincided with the anniversary of the Hamas attack on Israel. Copenhagen police are investigating a potential link to previous explosions, but believe the incident may have been caused by gunfire. Swedish nationals were previously detained in connection with earlier blasts.

title: Watch: Israel releases unseen footage from October 7 Hamas onslaught
content: On October 7, Israel faced one of its deadliest days as Hamas militants unleashed a massive attack, leading to over 1,200 Israeli deaths and more than 250 hostages. Israel's retaliation against Gaza resulted in over 41,000 civilian casualties, escalating into a broader conflict involving Hezbollah.
summary: On October 7, Israel faced one of its deadliest days as Hamas militants unleashed a massive attack, leading to over 1,200 Israeli deaths and more than 250 hostages. Israel's retaliation against Gaza resulted in over 41,000 civilian casualties, escalating into a broader conflict involving Hezbollah.

title: Kamala Harris dodges question on Netanyahu being US's 'close ally'
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris avoided a direct answer on whether Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu remains a 'close ally,' emphasizing the alliance between the American and Israeli people. She highlighted US efforts in pushing for a ceasefire amid Israel's ongoing attacks on Gaza and Lebanon. The US supports Israel's right to self-defense while urging minimization of civilian harm.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris avoided a direct answer on whether Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu remains a 'close ally,' emphasizing the alliance between the American and Israeli people. She highlighted US efforts in pushing for a ceasefire amid Israel's ongoing attacks on Gaza and Lebanon. The US supports Israel's right to self-defense while urging minimization of civilian harm.

title: Over 6,000 people in Haiti leave their homes after gang attack killed dozens
content: Nearly 6,300 people fled after gang violence in central Haiti killed at least 70. Displaced families mostly stay with relatives, while others shelter in various sites. The attack in Pont-Sonde involved shootings and arson. Authorities, including the UN and EU, condemned the violence. Prime Minister Garry Conille vowed justice for the victims.
summary: Nearly 6,300 people fled after gang violence in central Haiti killed at least 70. Displaced families mostly stay with relatives, while others shelter in various sites. The attack in Pont-Sonde involved shootings and arson. Authorities, including the UN and EU, condemned the violence. Prime Minister Garry Conille vowed justice for the victims.

title: 'Wouldn't have given birth': Gaza mother struggles to provide for newborns amid conflict
content: Following the deadly Hamas-led attack on Israel on October 7, 2023, Israel's counteroffensive has led to severe conditions for 2.3 million displaced Gazans. Compounded by widespread disease and limited access to essential resources, the crisis has particularly affected newborns and mothers, escalating humanitarian concerns. "If it were up to me, I wouldn't have gotten pregnant or given birth during the war," she said.
summary: Following the deadly Hamas-led attack on Israel on October 7, 2023, Israel's counteroffensive has led to severe conditions for 2.3 million displaced Gazans. Compounded by widespread disease and limited access to essential resources, the crisis has particularly affected newborns and mothers, escalating humanitarian concerns. "If it were up to me, I wouldn't have gotten pregnant or given birth during the war," she said.

title: Kamala Harris Kicks off media blitz with ‘Call Her Daddy’
content: Vice President Kamala Harris intensifies efforts for the November election through multiple media appearances targeting key voter groups. Her campaign focuses on abortion rights, student debt relief, and courting the youth and female voters. Meanwhile, Democratic candidate Tim Walz addresses past misspeaking incidents and plans further media engagements in swing states.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris intensifies efforts for the November election through multiple media appearances targeting key voter groups. Her campaign focuses on abortion rights, student debt relief, and courting the youth and female voters. Meanwhile, Democratic candidate Tim Walz addresses past misspeaking incidents and plans further media engagements in swing states.

title: Was Helene 'deliberately' steered towards Republican areas?
content: As Hurricane Milton approaches Florida, recovery from Hurricane Helene is hindered by conspiracy theories and misinformation. Claims of FEMA fund misappropriation and weather control have been debunked, yet continue to spread. Authorities strive to counteract these falsehoods to aid affected communities, but rising distrust complicates relief efforts.
summary: As Hurricane Milton approaches Florida, recovery from Hurricane Helene is hindered by conspiracy theories and misinformation. Claims of FEMA fund misappropriation and weather control have been debunked, yet continue to spread. Authorities strive to counteract these falsehoods to aid affected communities, but rising distrust complicates relief efforts.

title: Seized vehicles, weapons used by Hamas in October 7 attack on display in Israel
content: On the first anniversary of the October 7 attacks by Hamas, the IDF displayed seized items including vehicles, uniforms, and weapons. The exhibit highlighted the extensive military gear captured, amidst ongoing conflict and rising civilian casualties in Gaza, sparking international calls for a ceasefire and a two-state solution.
summary: On the first anniversary of the October 7 attacks by Hamas, the IDF displayed seized items including vehicles, uniforms, and weapons. The exhibit highlighted the extensive military gear captured, amidst ongoing conflict and rising civilian casualties in Gaza, sparking international calls for a ceasefire and a two-state solution.

title: 'Not 1950s anymore': Kamala Harris responds to 'doesn’t have children keeping her humble' remark
content: Vice president Kamala Harris rebutted Arkansas governor Sarah Huckabee Sanders' claims that she lacks humility due to not having biological children. Highlighting the evolving roles of women and family structures, Harris highlighted her 'modern family' and urged women to uplift each other.
summary: Vice president Kamala Harris rebutted Arkansas governor Sarah Huckabee Sanders' claims that she lacks humility due to not having biological children. Highlighting the evolving roles of women and family structures, Harris highlighted her 'modern family' and urged women to uplift each other.

title: US lawmakers arrive in Taiwan for bilateral talks amid China tensions
content: US Representatives Debbie Lesko, Andy Biggs, and Carol Miller visit Taiwan for talks with government officials, highlighting US Congress's support for Taiwan and stability in the Taiwan Strait. Discussions focus on US-Taiwan relations, security, and economic policies, with plans to enhance defence cooperation.
summary: US Representatives Debbie Lesko, Andy Biggs, and Carol Miller visit Taiwan for talks with government officials, highlighting US Congress's support for Taiwan and stability in the Taiwan Strait. Discussions focus on US-Taiwan relations, security, and economic policies, with plans to enhance defence cooperation.

title: PTI member 'invites' Jaishankar to join protest, party distances itself
content: Imran Khan's PTI has clarified it did not invite India's external affairs minister S Jaishankar to join its protests, emphasizing no foreign country can comment on its internal matters. Meanwhile, in Lahore, 30 PTI supporters were arrested as they demanded Khan's release.
summary: Imran Khan's PTI has clarified it did not invite India's external affairs minister S Jaishankar to join its protests, emphasizing no foreign country can comment on its internal matters. Meanwhile, in Lahore, 30 PTI supporters were arrested as they demanded Khan's release.

title: Chinese hackers breached US court wiretap systems: Report
'Ridiculous ploy': Lara Trump slams 165-page brief in father-in-law Donald Trump's election case
content: Lara Trump criticizes the timing of a federal prosecutors' brief in Donald Trump's election fraud case, calling it a 'ploy' to sway voters. The 165-page brief highlights accusations that Trump's actions post-2020 election were personal, not official. Trump has pleaded not guilty, maintaining the investigation is politically motivated while expressing his demand for a fair and transparent 2024 election.
summary: Lara Trump criticizes the timing of a federal prosecutors' brief in Donald Trump's election fraud case, calling it a 'ploy' to sway voters. The 165-page brief highlights accusations that Trump's actions post-2020 election were personal, not official. Trump has pleaded not guilty, maintaining the investigation is politically motivated while expressing his demand for a fair and transparent 2024 election.

title: The best memes of Elon Musk jumping at Trump's Butler rally
content: Elon Musk made headlines by appearing at Donald Trump's rally in Butler, Pennsylvania. Sporting a 'MAGA' cap and 'Occupy Mars' shirt, Musk dubbed himself 'Dark MAGA' and stressed the importance of Trump's victory in the 2024 election. He has established a super PAC to support Trump and shared a video endorsing the former president amidst an assassination attempt.
summary: Elon Musk made headlines by appearing at Donald Trump's rally in Butler, Pennsylvania. Sporting a 'MAGA' cap and 'Occupy Mars' shirt, Musk dubbed himself 'Dark MAGA' and stressed the importance of Trump's victory in the 2024 election. He has established a super PAC to support Trump and shared a video endorsing the former president amidst an assassination attempt.

title: Massive explosion near Karachi airport leaves several injured
content: An explosion near Karachi Airport caused by a suspected tanker blast has injured at least ten people and resulted in one fatality. Authorities are investigating the incident. Rescue teams and medical personnel are providing aid while the area and airport entry points remain closed for safety.
summary: An explosion near Karachi Airport caused by a suspected tanker blast has injured at least ten people and resulted in one fatality. Authorities are investigating the incident. Rescue teams and medical personnel are providing aid while the area and airport entry points remain closed for safety.

title: FEMA administrator hits back at Trump’s 'ridiculous' claims on Biden's Hurricane Helene response
content: President Biden’s administration refutes former President Trump’s claims regarding Hurricane Helene recovery efforts. FEMA administrator assures sufficient resources, while Trump alleges funds diversion. DHS Secretary Mayorkas indicates adequacy for immediate needs but cautions on potential fund shortages for future storms.
summary: President Biden’s administration refutes former President Trump’s claims regarding Hurricane Helene recovery efforts. FEMA administrator assures sufficient resources, while Trump alleges funds diversion. DHS Secretary Mayorkas indicates adequacy for immediate needs but cautions on potential fund shortages for future storms.

title: 'It featured graphic nudity...': R-rated film played on Qantas flight with children onboard
content: A Qantas flight from Sydney to Tokyo accidentally played an explicit movie due to a technical glitch, leaving passengers, including families and children, in shock. The crew switched to a family-friendly film after nearly an hour. Qantas apologized and is reviewing its movie selection process to prevent similar incidents.
summary: A Qantas flight from Sydney to Tokyo accidentally played an explicit movie due to a technical glitch, leaving passengers, including families and children, in shock. The crew switched to a family-friendly film after nearly an hour. Qantas apologized and is reviewing its movie selection process to prevent similar incidents.
